headline.main: American Missionary Among the Dead in Burkina Faso Siege

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Michael James Riddering, who moved from Florida, worked at the Les Ailes de Refuge Orphanage, about 70 miles from Ouagadougou.
lead_paragraph: Michael James Riddering, who moved from Florida, worked at the Les Ailes de Refuge Orphanage, about 70 miles from Ouagadougou.
